pure interface of class zeta.util.VerboseWriter

The documentated page. 
public abstract class VerboseWriter
{
    public static void setReceiver(PrintWriter writer);
    public static void setReceiver(Session session);
    public static VerboseWriter make(Name name,
                                     boolean active);
    public static VerboseWriter make(Name name,
                                     String property);
    public abstract void send(String message);
    public abstract void send(Format format);
    public abstract boolean isActive();
    private static class ActiveWriter
      extends VerboseWriter
    private static class DeactiveWriter
      extends VerboseWriter
    public VerboseWriter();
}
